basics.name: Chris Dang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences as well as a B.A in Animation in the Academy of Creative Media at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2023.

work.company: University of Hawaii John A. Burns School of Medcine
highlights: Topologize and render high resolution models of human anatomy using z-brush and subsatance painter.
Models are uploaded to Sketchfab and other platorms for UH JABSOM
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Provide, in person and over the phone, general instruction to users of a web-based system (searching, data entry, records maintenance).

volunteer.organization: The Association for Computing Machinery at the University of Hawaii at Manoa

awards.title: 2019 Hawaii Affiliate
awards.summary: Awarded to women who show aptitude and interest in IT and computing, solid leadership ability, good academic history, and plans for post-secondary education.

awards.title: The Walt Disney AANAPISI Scholarship

awards.summary: Scholarship awarded to Asian American and Pacific Islanders. Futher infomation will be on the website(https://apiascholars.org/scholarship/aanapisi-scholarship/).
